import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import logo from "../img/l.png"; import "./Header.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCartShopping } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import ListSearch from "../components/ListSearch"; const Header = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [count, setCount] = useState(); const [searchText, setSearchText] = useState(""); const [list, setList] = useState(false) const user = useSelector((state) => state.userReducer); const cartItems = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducer); const refOne = useRef(null) console.log("UUU", user); const logout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("token"); localStorage.removeItem("user"); dispatch({ type: "Login_Fail" }); console.log("user0ut", user); // navigate("/login"); }; const login = () => { navigate("/login"); }; const formSubmitted = (event) => { console.log('FORM SUBMIT',list) event.preventDefault(); // if(list){ // setList(false) // } // else{ // setList(true) // } } const changeSearch = (event) =>{ if(!list){ setList(true) } setSearchText(event.target.value) } const handleClickOutside = (e) =>{ if(!refOne.current.contains(e.target)){ setList(false) } } useEffect(() => { console.log("CARRRT", cartItems.cart); setCount(cartItems.cart.length); document.addEventListener("click", handleClickOutside, true) }, [cartItems]); return (
changeSearch(e)} ref={refOne} />
